Name: Encounter: Tempest
Description:
Before the game begins, search the encounter deck for The Tempest and put it onto the field.
Before time passes, you lose the game if there is 8 or more ⏳ on The Tempest.
You are in the eye of the storm while The Tempest has is 4 ⏳ on it.

Name: The Tempest
Description:
After you play an action, remove 1 ⏳ from The Tempest.
Add 1 ⏳ to The Tempest instead of removing it during the night's time passes step.
If The Tempest would be discarded, put 1 ⏳ on it instead.

Name: Approaching Storm
Description:
Before time passes, if there is less than 3 ⏳ on The Tempest, add ⏳ to it until there is 3 ⏳ on it. 
You can't remove ⏳ from The Tempest.

Name: Storm's Maw
Description:
If you are in the eye of the storm, this enemy does not attack during the night's attack step.
This enemy gets +X ❤️, where X is the number of ⏳ on The Tempest.

Name: Gale Force Winds
Description: Before this card is discarded, add X ⏳ from The Tempest, where X is the number of cards on your field.

Name: Funnel Clouds
Description: Before time passes, add 1 ⏳ from The Tempest.

Name: Spout Kraken
Description: After this enemy attacks, remove 1 ⏳ from The Tempest.

Name: Downpour
Description:
Add 2 ⏳ to Tempest.
Shuffle this event into the Encounter deck.

Name: Fog Wraith
Description: This enemy can't be dealt damage unless you are in the eye of the storm.
